project.name: J-C190B-POIX-10-ST03-DT01-DF07-CF03-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from a taint source. Math is performed on the value such that, if the value is 32767 or 32766, the resultant value 'wraps around', and becomes negative. This results in an infinite loop.

iopair.name: J-C190B-POIX-10-ST03-DT01-DF07-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: convert a .doc to HTML Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="2000" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="32767" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^Loop #-3276(7|8)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_cAlxWzEu8LDEXzxdJKf0 AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_PwyRwOQaSi OR (NOT finished_4ldjlmVGnY AND NOT (controlled_exit_3hPxnrlfFK OR continued_execution_jrR2lHXgVZ)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_PwyRwOQaSi OR (NOT finished_4ldjlmVGnY AND NOT (controlled_exit_3hPxnrlfFK OR continued_execution_jrR2lHXgVZ))) OR controlled_exit_3hPxnrlfFK)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_PwyRwOQaSi OR (NOT finished_4ldjlmVGnY AND NOT (controlled_exit_3hPxnrlfFK OR continued_execution_jrR2lHXgVZ)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_PwyRwOQaSi OR (NOT finished_4ldjlmVGnY AND NOT (controlled_exit_3hPxnrlfFK OR continued_execution_jrR2lHXgVZ))) OR controlled_exit_3hPxnrlfFK))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
